last_episode_to_air.name: ...Don't You Cry
last_episode_to_air.overview: Goodwin is tasked with enforcing difficult cuts to hospital personnel. Charles' daughter is hospitalized after a car accident. A transplant patient makes a life-changing decision.

name: Chicago Med
overview: An emotional thrill ride through the day-to-day chaos of the city's most explosive hospital and the courageous team of doctors who hold it together. They will tackle unique new cases inspired by topical events, forging fiery relationships in the pulse-pounding pandemonium of the emergency room.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Inside the high-stakes emergency department of Chicago’s top hospital, a team of doctors and nurses faces intense medical cases while navigating complex emotions and ethical dilemmas. The adrenaline never stops — and neither does the pressure.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As the hospital expands its reach, tensions rise between departments. Personal struggles, bureaucratic red tape, and moral challenges test the resolve of every staff member working to save lives.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: New leadership and shifting dynamics complicate the day-to-day operations of Gaffney Medical. While the staff strives to maintain compassion in the face of chaos, the boundaries between personal and professional lives continue to blur.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Romance, rivalry, and unexpected alliances stir within the ER. As medical technology and politics collide, the team must fight to put patients first — even when the system works against them.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Trauma strikes both inside and outside the hospital walls. As lives hang in the balance, the staff must rely on each other more than ever, all while facing the emotional toll of the job.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Staff changes and strained relationships shift the foundation of the ER. As high-stakes cases unfold, the hospital becomes a battleground of ambition, compassion, and survival.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Familiar faces return while new ones shake up the status quo. With every diagnosis, a deeper story unfolds — and the line between healing and hurting grows thinner.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: Medical breakthroughs, personal reckoning, and career-defining choices drive the staff of Gaffney Medical. The stakes have never been higher — in surgery, in love, and in life.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: Medical breakthroughs, personal reckoning, and career-defining choices drive the staff of Gaffney Medical. The stakes have never been higher — in surgery, in love, and in life.

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: A mass casualty crisis shakes Gaffney Medical to its core. New doctors bring change, while personal and professional tensions test the team’s resolve in an ever-evolving ER.
